## Matrix.getRotationMatrix() method

Gets only rotation part of the current matrix

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getRotationMatrix(): Matrix;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

`Matrix`

a new matrix sets to the extracted rotation matrix from the current one
